files:
- wrapper: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/master/dxwnd/v2_05_39_build.rar
- mod: N/A:Please select JJ2+ 5.12 Windows install file, available for  download from
    your GOG account page.
- gamecfg: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Jazz%20Jackrabbit%202/JJ2plus_config.tar.xz
game:
  arch: win64
  args: /R:1
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:

    description: Creating WINE prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:

    format: gog
- extract:
